text.0: lightly your coursers travel through the regions when round the sea of air your car is flying.
text.1: your golden fellies scatter drops of moisture drinking the sweetness ye attend the mornings.
text.2: ye as ye travel overtake the courser who flies apart the friend of man most holy.
text.3: the prayer is that the sister may convey you all praised meathdrinkers to support and strengthen.
text.4: ye have deposited matured within her in the raw cow the first milk of the milchcow.
text.5: which the bright offerer shining like a serpent mid trees presents to you whose form is perfect.
text.6: ye made the fierce heat to be full of sweetness for atri at his wish like streaming water.
text.7: fireoffering thence is yours o aśvins heroes your carwheels speed to us like springs of honey.
text.8: like tugras ancient son may i ye mighty bring you to give your gifts with milkoblations.
text.9: your greatness compasseth earth heaven and waters decayed for you is sorrows net ye holy.
text.10: when bounteous ones ye drive your yoked team downward ye send by your own natures understanding.
text.11: swift as the wind let the prince please and feast you he like a pious man gains strength for increase.
text.12: for verily we truthful singers praise you the niggard trafficker is here excluded.
text.13: now even now do ye o blameless aśvins ye mighty guard the man whose god is near him.
text.14: you of a truth day after day o aśvins that he might win the very plenteous torrent.
text.15: agastya famous among mortal heroes roused with a thousand lauds like sounds of music.
text.16: when with the glory of your car ye travel when we go speeding like the priest of mortals.
text.17: and give good horses to sacrificers may we nāsatyas gain our share of riches.
text.18: with songs of praise we call today o aśvins that your new chariot for our own wellbeing.
text.19: that circles heaven with neverinjured fellies may we find strengthening food in full abundance.
